duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluating patients' physical abilities and medical conditions through diagnostic tests and health history analysis.
Developing personalized treatment plans that focus on patient goals, including pain management, mobility improvement, and overall physical function.
Implementing therapeutic interventions, such as exercise, manual therapy, and patient education, to promote healing and recovery.
Collaborating with the multidisciplinary team to ensure comprehensive patient care.
Documenting patient progress and adjusting treatment plans as necessary using Electronic Medical Records (EMR).
Educating patients and their families about their conditions and the therapeutic exercises they can do at home.
Complying with all federal, state, and local regulations, as well as professional standards of practice.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Physical Therapy or related field, Current state licensure as a Physical Therapist, Minimum of 1 year of experience in physical therapy with a focus on sports, orthopedics, or rehabilitation.
